# AudioResource.InputMode.nonSpatial

**Case**

the input channels are mixed to whatever the output format is without any spatialization

## Declaration

```swift
case nonSpatial
```

## Input modes

- **AudioResource.InputMode.spatial**: a spatialized with all degrees of freedom. This treats a resource as a mono stream so mixes all its channels to mono
- **AudioResource.InputMode.ambient**: spatialized but ignores listener translation and only follows listener head rotation
